nodes.text: Yani was a Gotal male resident on the Colossus.

Yani was an older Gotal male, and a citizen of the Colossus. He was one of the first three to hear the news about Kazuda Xiono being the best starfighter pilot in the galaxy, a rumor spread by Neeku Vozo.
Yani was voiced by Bobby Moynihan who also voiced Orka.
